post:
**<u>Austenite</u>** provides affordable, secure and fast web hosting for many selective clients globally. Please see our offers below and do feel free to reach out to us should you have any further questions.

Due to the ongoing popularity of our BF deals we've decided just to keep them running on a permanent basis and have now changed them simply to <u>LET SPECIALS</u>.

**<u>FURTHER CHRISTMAS DISCOUNT</u>**

USING COUPON **HOHOHO** WILL DISCOUNT THESE ALREADY MASSIVELY REDUCED PACKAGES BY 50% - RECURRING. VALID FROM TODAY UNTIL THE 5TH OF JANUARY 2019.

**<u>FEATURES</u>**

<ul>
<li>cPanel 
<li>Comprehensive DDoS Protection
<li>EU & US Locations 
<li>CloudLinux 
<li>LiteSpeed
<li><b>FAST</b> SSD Storage
<li>Softaculous
<li>Unlimited <b>FREE</b> SSL certificates
<li>PHP Selector (versions 5.6 to 7.2)
<li>99.99% Uptime SLA
<li>Self Healing Network 
<li>24/7 Expert Support
</ul>

**<u>PRICING & PLANS</u>**

The only limitation placed on our packages are the overall disk space and bandwidth allowances on each, other resources such as MySQL Databases, Addon Domains and email accounts are totally unlimited. 

**LETSHARED 1**
-1GB SSD Storage
-125GB Bandwidth
-Unlimited Hosted Domains
